ChangeList.Description: Removed the **userExperienceAnalyticsWorkFromAnywhereMetrics** relationship from the [deviceManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **userExperienceAnalyticsDeviceScores** relationship from the [deviceManagement](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **esimIdentifier** property from the [hardwareInformation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-hardwareInformation?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **chromeOSCount** property from the [deviceOperatingSystemSummary](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-deviceOperatingSystemSummary?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the type of the **azureAdRegistered** property in the [userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Changed the **azureAdRegistered** property in the [userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-userExperienceAnalyticsNotAutopilotReadyDevice?view=graph-rest-beta) resource from optional to required.
Removed the `activateDeviceEsim` member from the **remoteAction** enumeration.
Removed the **activateDeviceEsim** method from the [managedDevice](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/intune-managedDevice?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **persistEsimDataPlan** parameter from the [wipe](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/intune-managedDevice-wipe?view=graph-rest-beta) method.
